name: Nichibutsu Collection 1
overview: A compilation of two Nichibutsu/Nihon Bussan games that had previously been released on the Super Famicom. It is the first of two compilations for the system that draws from Nichibutsu's earlier Super Famicom output, and is distinct from the Nichibutsu Arcade Classics duo. The second compilation, Nichibutsu Collection 2, was released the following month. It features the following two games: Gion Hana (1994): A game based on hanafuda that uses a board game framing device. Kouryaku Casino Bar (1995): A gambling game that features various casino fixtures.
